page.title: 01ST.SAMPSON'S-a general view.
page.content: The area that we have been given to study for the Domesday Project is part of the parish of St.Sampson's in Guernsey. It has a large shopping area called 'The Bridge'. There is a coastline which is not sandy at all but it does include a reclamation area. Around the shopping area there is a large harbour area with deep water facilities for large ships which offload fuel and heavy cargo. There is a lot of light industry and owner-occupied houses. A secondary school and two primary schools are situated in and around a park which has spectacular views over the surrounding islands of the Bailiwick of Guernsey.
